content: Operating revenues in our institutional segment increased 120.3 million versus the prior year, primarily driven by $73.5 million increase in securities operating revenues compared to the prior year period, resulting from a 60% increase in securities rate per million as well as an 18% increase in the average daily volume of securities transactions. Operating revenues in our retail segment added 15.4 million versus the prior year, which is primarily driven by a $23.3 million increase in FX and CFD revenues as a result of a 57% increase in RPM, which was partially offset by a 7% decline in FX/CFD average daily volume as compared to the prior year.
